CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 4, 1950, pg. 3 reads: "Valedictorian - Herman Thomas, president of the mid-year graduating class at Peabody High School, delivered the valedictory address at exercises held in Soldiers and Sailors Memorial Hall Tuesday evening. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Full length portrait of Herman Thomas wearing graduation cap and gown, standing in corridor of Soldiers and Sailors Memorial Hall for Peabody High School mid-year graduation
